import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Breadcrumb, BreadcrumbItem, Button, Row, Col, Label } from "reactstrap"; import { Control, Errors, actions, Form } from "react-redux-form"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; class Contact extends Component { handleSubmit(values) { console.log("Current State is: " + JSON.stringify(values)); alert("Current State is: " + JSON.stringify(values)); this.props.resetFeedbackForm(); // event.preventDefault(); } render() { const required = val => val && val.length; const maxLength = len => val => !val || val.length <= len; const minLength = len => val => val && val.length >= len; const isNumber = val => !isNaN(Number(val)); const validEmail = val => /^[A-Z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Z0-9.-]+\.[A-Z]{2,4}$/i.test(val); return (
